### initializeNetwork() {#a46dd2e73fdb4a5c9bf2af4a8fa968bd1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;SampleProfileInference.cpp&#125;::initializeNetwork (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/profiparams">ProfiParams</a> &amp; Params, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sampleprofileinference-cpp-/mincostmaxflow">MinCostMaxFlow</a> &amp; Network, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/flowfunction">FlowFunction</a> &amp; Func)</>}>
Initializing flow network for a given function.

Every block is split into two nodes that are responsible for (i) an incoming flow, (ii) an outgoing flow; they penalize an increase or a reduction of the block weight.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/sampleprofileinference-cpp/#l01056">1056</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/sampleprofileinference-cpp">SampleProfileInference.cpp</a>.

### INF {#a001dbf74fedb2ab9b6f541f6943dea14}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int64&#95;t anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;SampleProfileInference.cpp&#125;::INF = ((int64&#95;t)1) &lt;&lt; 50</>}
  labels = {["constexpr", "static"]}>
A value indicating an infinite flow/capacity/weight of a block/edge.

Not using numeric&#95;limits&lt;int64&#95;t&gt;::max(), as the values can be summed up during the execution.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/sampleprofileinference-cpp/#l00070">70</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/sampleprofileinference-cpp">SampleProfileInference.cpp</a>.
